dataset_id: BOREAS NS001 TMS Level-2 Images: Reflectance and Temperature in BSQ Format
title: BOREAS NS001 TMS Level-2 Images: Reflectance and Temperature in BSQ Format
summary: This information includes detailed land cover and biophysical parameter maps such as fPAR and LAI.  Collection of the NS001 images occurred over the study areas during the 1994 field campaigns.  The Level-2 NS001 data are atmospherically corrected versions of some of the best original NS001 imagery and cover the dates of 19-Apr-1994, 07-Jun-1994, 21-Jul-1994, 08-Aug-1994, and 16-Sep-1994.
